29 inline double CSplineSegmentFunction::GetValueKernelAt(double alpha)
30 {
31  return (2 * alpha - 3) * alpha * alpha + 1;
32 }
33 
34 
35 inline double CSplineSegmentFunction::GetDerivativeKernelAt(double alpha)
36 {
37  double beta = 1 - alpha;
38  return alpha * beta * beta;
39 }

Helper class for calculation of splines of 3rd degree.
